title: Who did the login theme for Rakan/Xayah?
body:
Yet another incredible piece for the newest _champions_
I just love to let you guys know when the song hits the figurative bulls-eye.
The login themes honestly make me want to buy a champ more than their gameplay.

replies.body:
:) Thanks for the kind words, Flying Buntcake!

<3

Ed the Conqueror

> [{quoted}](name=Ed the Conqueror,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=xtW34gM9,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-04-12T00:32:47.600+0000)
>
> :) Thanks for the kind words, Flying Buntcake!
> 
> <3
> 
> Ed the Conqueror

Damn I'm listening to this for the first time and it's really good. Manages to create it's own sound without relying on overused "asian" sounds. Great work.

> [{quoted}](name=Berserknurple,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=xtW34gM9,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-04-12T01:01:02.341+0000)
>
> Damn I'm listening to this for the first time and it's really good. Manages to create it's own sound without relying on overused "asian" sounds. Great work.

Thanks! I actually traveled to Vietnam and Cambodia during the time I was working on the project. It was a pretty good reality check as to what "Asian" can sound like :)

Honestly, you keep coming out with hit after hit.
Seeing how much emotion and story into a song is part of the reason why I want to be a composer too.

> [{quoted}](name=Ed the Conqueror,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=xtW34gM9,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-04-12T00:32:47.600+0000)
>
> :) Thanks for the kind words, Flying Buntcake!
> 
> <3
> 
> Ed the Conqueror

And if I remember correctly a few months, you also mentioned doing Elementalist Lux and Jhin

-- I checked, you did. 

I'm asking again. Can I worship you now? Xayah and Rakan theme is also great.

Keep up the good work.

It was Ed (the Conqueror), as far as I recall.

Source for this should be in one in his recent Boards posts, I think.
